sn35.112:1.1: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding sights …
sn35.112:1.6: thoughts, without dispassion for them and giving them up, you can’t end suffering.
sn35.112:1.7: By directly knowing and completely understanding sights …
sn35.112:1.12: thoughts, having dispassion for them and giving them up, you can end suffering.”
